goal: Environmental association. It deals with protected areas, defense of the territory, biodiversity, promotion of natural resources and sustainable lifestyles and environmental education.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Education, Energy, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Public Health
euInitiatives: We are active in areas Natura2000 network (karst, lagoon, coastal wetlands).
